welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Freeport, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our charming town and soak up all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for American Airlines and American Eagle.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for various airlines including Delta, Southwest, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights for United Airlines and United Express.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.
